post.text: This is not simply another 4-year election. This is a crossroads in the HISTORY of our civilization that will determine whether or not We The People reclaim control over OUR government!

comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: We got our ballots in the mail yesterday, my husband and I will vote Trump!

replies.author: Evan
replies.text: WAY TO GO LACEY AND YOUR HUSBAND! YOU ARE TRUE PATRIOTIC AMERICAN HEROES!

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: I hope he is our next president SO BAD!!!!

replies.author: Olivia
replies.text: My family and most of my former coworkers (im retired) are voting TRUMP in PA. Thats about 320 for Trump. :) TRUMP 2016
